title: TECHNIMAX
description:
Virtual no-go zones
With virtual no-go zones, the robot can be kept away from living areas or entire rooms. Simply define arbitrarily large exclusion zones.

area cleaning
In addition to the entire apartment, individual rooms and areas can also be cleaned. Furthermore, these can be named personally and the suction power can be set individually for each room / area.


remote access
Start or stop the cleaning at any time while on the move or track the cleaning progress in real time.

calendar
The regular cleaning can be easily adjusted via a calendar. Choose the time and the days - the robot will automatically clean at the scheduled time.

Notifications
The TECHNIMAX app offers the possibility of displaying the current status of the robot, eg B a full dust container or a blocked brush to retrieve. In addition to this information, the app also provides appropriate solutions to all sorts of issues that can be reported directly through the app.

WIRELESS INTERNET ACCESS
The connection between the robot and the TECHNIMAX app takes place via the home network and requires a standard WLAN router with a 2.4 GHz band.

In addition to the entire apartment, individual rooms and areas can also be cleaned. Furthermore, these can be named personally and the suction power can be set individually for each room / area.
